about_the_game:
In this free DLC, you get new stories written by three horror experts:
ManlyBadassHero - Alpha Beta Gamer - The Mason Scale.

The stories are not part of the main game, but can be played separately and are accessible from the main game menu.

ManlyBadassHero is known for his deep voice and numerous let's plays of indie horror games. He's someone who truly spends many hours on a game to uncover all its secrets.

Alpha Beta Gamer has been a champion of indie games for many years, both through the ABG website and ABG’s no-comment let’s play videos. Few people have seen more indie horror games than ABG.

The Mason Scale is currently one of the best horror game reviewers, if you ask us.

These are three quite different and unique horror stories compared to the rest of the stories in the main game. We can't wait to hear which one you liked best!

content_descriptors.notes: Murder is displayed with very low pixel graphics.
